content.rendered: Pusat kamera CCTV Samsung, kami menyediakan Kamera CCTV CCTV Camera Samsung QNV-6070RP untuk anda dengan harga murah. Anda dapat memantau kegiatan / aktivitas sehari-hari dengan jarak jauh secara real time. Samsung CCTV Camera Samsung QNV-6070RP tipe kamera pengawas yang memiliki kelebihan spesifikasi yakni: Max. 2M (1920 x 1080) resolution 2.8 ~ 12mm (4.3x) varifocal lens Max. 30fps@2M resolutions H.265, H.264, MJPEG codec supported, Multiple streaming Motion detection, Tampering, Defocus detection micro SD (128GB) memory slot, PoE / 12V DC IR viewable length 30m, IP66, IK10 Hallway view support (Rotate 90˚/270˚) LDC support (Lens Distortion Correction)

excerpt.rendered: Max. 2M (1920 x 1080) resolution 2.8 ~ 12mm (4.3x) varifocal lens Max. 30fps@2M resolutions H.265, H.264, MJPEG codec supported, Multiple streaming Motion detection, Tampering, Defocus detection micro SD (128GB) memory slot, PoE / 12V DC IR viewable length 30m, IP66, IK10 Hallway view support (Rotate 90˚/270˚) LDC support (Lens Distortion Correction)
